channel.title: [PI] Trade Duping
channel.description: Ok, i need a little help on my duping problems on the server I mostly got all of them but i can't seem to fix the trade problem. If some one trades and clicks accept twice on the second screen of the trade then it will dupe the items. Is there anyway to stop this from happening i was thinking of adding where they can only hit accept once, but i don't know what to add there. If its server sided or client sided. It seems that only the person trading the items, is the person who items get duped like, the person keeps his items but the other person gets the items well.

item.title: [PI] Trade Duping
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Kill, you’ll want server sided dupe fixes as client sided can be edited by players.
All known dupes for Pi have tuts on them unless there very uncommon so search away(:

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Trade Duping
item.dc:creator: @killadragz14 killadragz14
item.description:
@killadragz14 wrote:

Ok, i need a little help on my duping problems on the server
I mostly got all of them but i can’t seem to fix the trade problem.
If some one trades and clicks accept twice on the second screen of the trade then it will dupe the items.
Is there anyway to stop this from happening i was thinking of adding where they can only hit accept once, but i don’t know what to add there.
If its server sided or client sided.
It seems that only the person trading the items, is the person who items get duped like, the person keeps his items but the other person gets the items well.
